sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Form, Button, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; function CreatePost({posts}) { const submitHandler = () => { var uname = document.getElementById("#username").value; var cap = document.getElementById("#caption").value; var img = document.getElementById("#image").value; const postobj = {username:uname,caption:cap,image:img} posts.unshift(postobj) } return (
Username Caption Image
{posts.map(post=>( <>
{post.username}
{post.username}  {post.caption}
))}
); } export default CreatePost;
